item.title: Sample Post
item.description: Code Snippet 1 2 3 # Python Code print("This is a sample post to show code snippets and gif/videos") print("I added line numbers to the code snippet!") 1 2 3 # Python Code print("This is a sample post for code snippet 2") print("I added line numbers to the code snippet!") item.title: New Features
item.description: Table of Contents Problem Statement Objective Prerequisites Steps From Content Development Perspective Parsers Ownership Tracking Allowed Changes Restricted Changes From Content Admin Perspective Parsers New Improved Deploy Action Manage Content Daily Housekeeping Job Policies Manage Content Deprecate Policies 1 Problem Statement Customers donâ€™t have an option to update customized securonix OOTB parsers. Application lacks ownership tracking of the parser at a granular level. 2 Objective Resource groups require a certain level of customization specific to a customer or tenant.
